attributes.action: Stop government mental health cuts. Mental health is as important and physical.
attributes.additional_details: Please help to stop government funding cuts to therapies and psychiatric help across the UK.
attributes.background: People who suffer with mental health difficulties often find it difficult to Talk because they either; don't know where to get the help, or they are afraid of what people will say if they find out about their mental health struggles. Mental and physical health issues are both serious issues.
